select BILLADDR1 AS billAddress1, BILLADDR2 AS billAddress2, BILLCITY, BILLCOUNTRY, BILLSTATE, BILLTOFIRSTNAME, BILLTOLASTNAME, BILLZIP, SHIPADDR1 AS shipAddress1, SHIPADDR2 AS shipAddress2, SHIPCITY, SHIPCOUNTRY, SHIPSTATE, SHIPTOFIRSTNAME, SHIPTOLASTNAME, SHIPZIP, CARDTYPE, COURIER, CREDITCARD, EXPRDATE AS expiryDate, LOCALE, ORDERDATE, ORDERS.ORDERID, TOTALPRICE, USERID AS username, STATUS FROM ORDERS, ORDERSTATUS WHERE ORDERS.ORDERID = #{value} AND ORDERS.ORDERID = ORDERSTATUS.ORDERID
